elements.title: blotter art (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that you've probably eaten blotter art (examples pictured) if you've ever taken LSD?

elements.title: Quintin Johnstone (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Quintin Johnstone advocated giving control of an American-governed law school to native Ethiopians?

elements.title: crusading movement (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the crusading movement defined concepts of warfare throughout medieval Europe?

elements.title: Said Iqbal (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that according to its president Said Iqbal, Indonesia's Labour Party would form "personal" coalitions with presidential candidates?

elements.title: smell of freshly cut grass (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the chemicals responsible for the smell of freshly cut grass are a plant defense mechanism?

elements.title: Hardy Browning (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that New Zealand potter Hardy Browning began his career as a coal miner?

elements.title: Inheritance (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Edvard Munch's Inheritance is an inversion of the traditional artistic subject of the Madonna and Child?

elements.title: Jenise Spiteri (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that in between snowboarding runs at the 2022 Winter Olympics, Jenise Spiteri ate a bao that she forgot was in her pocket?
